programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two young boys were found tied and murdered with similar wounds within three months of each other. An investigation leads to the conviction of John Joubert, an air force-enlisted man who carries the same exact rope used to bind the two boys.

programme.desc: Police exhume the body of a murdered woman to study bite wounds, which eventually lead to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young women went missing for three years until someone called to report a suspicious truck in a driveway. The cold trail turned even colder when they found out what was being stored in the truck.

programme.title: American Greed: Scams, Scoundrels and Scandals

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Delko witnesses a bank robbery and the CSI team soon discovers that the culprits are playing out the action from the videogame Urban Hellraisers on the streets of Miami. In order to stop the game, the CSIs must stop them before they strike again.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team is stunned when Delko is busted for purchasing marijuana. However, as the truth as to why becomes clearer, Horatio must fight to keep him as a CSI. Meanwhile, after a suspected drug lord is gunned down, evidence leads to a dirty bounty hunter.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Natalia's mission to solve cold cases is a success when a man imprisoned for rape is set free six years later. However, when the CSIs re-examine the evidence, find the true culprit and go to arrest him, they find that someone else has already killed him.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A man is brutally murdered while trying to learn how to pick up women at a hip Miami nightclub. The victim was taking lessons from seasoned pros on how to score women in the competitive Miami nightlife, and was nearly successful before he was killed.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a female executive is shot at an afternoon concert, the evidence leads the team to suspect that the dreaded Mala Noche gang has struck again. Now, as the team gathers evidence, they must try to find the criminal connection.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Evidence shows that a series of murders at Miami's clubs are linked to organized crime, but also leads the team to a pair of film students whose screenplay mirrors the details of the crime. Meanwhile, Ryan's eyesight worsens and jeopardizes his career.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Walter Resden, an alleged serial killer who eluded Horatio 11 years ago in New York City and again more recently in Miami, returns and Horatio is horrified when he learns that the man is seeing the daughter of one of his alleged victims.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A registered sex offender living in Alexx's neighbourhood dies after being attacked by four men near a park. Horatio fears that posters Alexx put up in the neighbourhood warning parents about the sex offender living in the area may have led to his murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A woman is initially thought to have died in a terrible auto accident. However, further evidence reveals that she was killed after the accident. As the investigation intensifies, Horatio is forced to ask Natalia to reveal a secret from her past.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A man goes on trial for his wife's murder, even though her body was never discovered and the jury finds him to be not guilty. Horatio comes to believe that the suspect committed a so-called practice murder to prepare himself to kill his wife.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Three masked men rob women at a day spa. One of the victims is shot when she fights back. When Horatio arrives on the scene, he learns that another woman injured in the attack is Marisol. Later, Horatio and Marisol make a surprising decision.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Leo and Sienna's illegal activities transformed them from common criminals to media darlings. However, after they are released from jail, their past misdeeds catch up with them. Meanwhile, Calleigh's ex-boyfriend is assigned to help her on the case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team races to locate a kidnapped woman who dialled a wrong number on her cell phone. Meanwhile, Horatio helps Marisol when she must make a difficult decision about the future. Also, Ryan gets Delko's permission to ask out Natalia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates a double homicide aboard a cruise ship docked in Miami. The long list of suspects include a victim's wife who he met and married just seven days prior, her daughter, the ship's magician and the corrupt captain of the ship.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A spoiled heiress' red carpet rival, personal assistant and musician boyfriend are the prime suspects when she's found murdered. Meanwhile, Horatio tells Delko that he and Marisol are getting married as soon as possible.
